blogPost.excerpt: Scan anything: objects, people, pets, text, books, and documents. Scan Thing uses cutting-edge machine learning and computer-vision algorithms. You don't need internet access, an account, or a subscription. There's no data collection, no ads, and no nonsense.
blogPost.body: Scan anything: objects, people, pets, text, books, and documents. Scan Thing uses cutting-edge machine learning and computer-vision algorithms. You don't need internet access, an account, or a subscription. There's no data collection, no ads, and no nonsense.
blogPost.title: Scan Thing - Quickest way to capture and save anything around you
blogPost.author: Pierre Liebenberg

localize.description: 扫描任何东西：物体、人、宠物、文本、书籍和文档。Scan Thing 使用尖端的机器学习和计算机视觉算法。您不需要上网，不需要账户，也不需要订阅。没有数据收集，没有广告，也没有废话。
localize.tagline: 捕捉和保存您周围任何事物的最快速方法

localize.description: 掃描任何東西：物體、人、寵物、文本、書籍和文檔。Scan Thing 使用尖端的機器學習和計算機視覺算法。您不需要上網，不需要賬戶，也不需要訂閱。沒有數據收集，沒有廣告，也沒有廢話。
localize.tagline: 捕捉和保存您周圍任何事物的最快速方法
